name: Running Meat
description:
Running Meat is an endless runner where you are a meat and want to survive as long as possible.

Time is your enemy since you can’t control your running speed as it passes. And, although you have obstacles and enemies trying to stop you, there are power-ups to help you on your journey.

Compete with your friends for the higher possible (or impossible) score that you can get.

Features: - Speed raises as you run - 3 Power-Ups to help you on your journey - Random spawns - Different kinds of enemies and obstacles start to spawn based on your current score
